transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello. Prince Sharma ji se baat ho jayegi?

Executive: Haanji, mai mai baat kar rahi hu mam. Lagdataar associate se hi baat kar rahi hu, bataiye.

Customer: Sir, mam mai IndiaMART head office se baat kar rahi hu. Senior manager working here, kaise hai aap?

Executive: Badhiya mam, aap bataiye.

Customer: Aapka ek ye Lakdataar associates ke naam se ek catalog forward hua tha mere paas. Aapki baat hui hogi mam aapke account manager se.

Customer: Account manager kitne, suniye mam account manager 36 account manager hai mam. Mai pichle dedh mahine se ye keh rahi hu madam ki mera payment refund kar do, refund kar do, refund kar do, refund kar do. Kyunki mujhe kisi bhi tarah ka na to koi benefit ho raha hai, thik hai mam?

Customer: Aur jab se maine ye portal liya hai tab se hi mai itna pareshan ho rakhi hu ki aap bas puchiye mat. Kam se kam bhi chhe mere account manager change ho chuke hai.

Customer: Thik hai? Kahi se bhi mujhe koi dhang se koi revert nahi mil raha hai. Har jagah hi mai kisi bhi aapke ek bhi account manager se satisfied nahi hu.

Executive: Mam mai aapka naam jaan sakti hu ki problem kya aa raha hai matlab?

Customer: Problem ye aa raha hai mam ki sab do-do ghante sirf apna ye ki feedback lene ke liye baat karte hai.

Customer: Thik hai? Feedback unko de do to wohi kehte hai ki hum ye kar denge, woh kar denge. Mere portal pe koi bhi dhang ki lead nahi aa rahi. Bulk me lead mujhe chahiye, mera bulk me kaam hota hai, thik hai? Manufacturing unit hai hamari. To waha pe maine har cheez ke liye bola mere product se related jo lead mere paas aani chahiye, woh lead nahi aa rahi mere paas, thik hai? Maine continue do-do mahine, dedh-dedh mahine maine apne portal pe active reh ke dekha hai. Uske baad maine active hi rehna chhod diya. Kis base pe? Kyunki baat kar lete hai ab maan liya ki abhi feedback lena hai. Do-teen din baad aayenge continue zoom meeting hoegi, video call hoegi, sab kuch hoega, sari cheeze hoengi then phir mujhe kya milega revert me? Kuch bhi nahi.

Customer: Thik hai? Uske baad phir woh log koi mera ye feedback nahi lete hai, koi kuch bhi nahi hai. Mai baar-baar bol-bol ke thak gayi hu ki bhai inko change karo, matlab mujhe koi woh output nahi mil raha mam.

Customer: Aur maine ye change karo aapne bola?

Executive: Kya?

Executive: Aapka services jab se activate hua hai aapko almost char-paanch mahine ho chuke hai service activate hue, right?

Customer: Haan, char-paanch mahine ho chuke hai. Teen mahine to mujhe gol-gol waise hi ghumaya gaya. Aa jayengi, abhi nahi aayegi, abhi start kiya hai, abhi abhi start kiya hai aap portal pe aapka abhi join kiya hai to time lagega thoda sa lead aane me ye woh falan dinkar aise-aise bol ke har mahine matlab bande hi change hote rahe hai. Pichle dedh mahine se mai ye keh rahi hu ki mai tang aa chuki hu, mujhe kuch nahi chahiye, meri jo payment hai woh refund kar do.

Customer: Aur koi bhi mujhe feedback nahi mil raha mam. Mera please request hai mai har bande se jis-jiska phone aa raha hai na sabse mai ek hi cheez keh rahi hu ki meri payment refund karwa do bhai mujhe pata hai mam itni jagah pe kaam hua hai har portal me hamare paas Trade India ka bhi waha pe bhi badhiya kaam ho raha hai. Lekin aapke yaha pe itni gandi services mili hai itni gandi ki bas mat pucho.

Executive: What's your good name mam? Aapka naam jaan sakte hai?

Customer: Vaishnavi Sharma.

Executive: Vaishnavi. Vaishnavi ji, pehli cheez mai kuch aapse na discuss karna chahungi. Aapka problem jo bhi hai aapka mai bilkul samajh gayi ki aap keh rahe ho.

Executive: Bahut sari cheeze hai, right? Aapko first of all aapko aapke product se related aap keh rahe ho lead hi nahi aa rahi hai, right?

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Aap line pe rahiye ek minute, mai aapka open kar leti hu pura. Jitni leads kitni aapko aayi hai, kitni nahi aayi hai.

Executive: Hmm, aapka mai buylead ka section ek baar open kara hai. Aapne jo apna ye dalwaya hai product. Pehle mai aapke product batati hu aap mujhe batana ye sahi hai ki nahi hai. D cut non-woolen bags aap provide karate ho?

Customer: Woolen nahi mam, woven.

Executive: Woven, sorry. D cut non-woven bags, thik? PP spun bone wala jo non-woven fabric hai woh bhi aap karte hai. Non-woven w cut bags ho gaye. Printed non-woven bags ho gaye.

Customer: Ye maine ye maine abhi jo jo Smrita Smrita Smrita abhi jo account manager thi usne mujhse dobara liye hai ye sab. Ye sab dobara liye maine unke whatsapp pe ye bheje to woh keh rahi mai dobara aapka catalog change karwa rahi hu. Aapka dobara catalog karwa ke ye karwa de woh karwa de. Unko bhi unse bhi baat karte-karte mera dedh-do mahina ho gaya aap unse puchiye jara ki do mahine se meri unse baat ho rahi hai nahi ho rahi hai, do mahine se mai unko kya keh rahi hu.

Executive: Mam ek minute, mai as a senior manager yaha pe working hu aur mai agar aapko call kar rahi hu to aapke solution ke liye hi call kar rahi hu. Right? Mam mera solution karwa do mam please aapki badi meherbani hogi mere upar ki payment refund karwa do. Mujhe kafi pareshani ho rahi hai.

Executive: IndiaMART ki koi bhi jo service aapki chal rahi hai.

Customer: Refund policy refund policy nahi hai to phir madam mera bulk me kaam karwaiye please.

Executive: Haan bilkul, mai aapka point samajh gayi mam. But mai dekhiye aapka point mai bilkul samajh rahi hu mam aur mai usko solve karne ke liye hi aapse baat kar rahi hu. Baat cheez mam dekhiye jo cheeze ho gayi ab woh jiska bhi fault raha ho mai manti hu mam ho sakta hai aapko aapki side se aapko lag raha ho ki IndiaMART ka cheeze upar-niche hui hai baar-baar aapke account manager badle hai. No problem mam us cheez ko hum samajhte hai aur mai us cheez ko aapka rectify karke maine now Smrita is the senior account manager aapko assign karai hai, right? Jo aapka work acche tarike se dekhe even agar aap pehle se aur ab me dekhoge to aapke changes hai aapka score category score accha bada hai aapka product line bahut acche se line up hai sab cheeze hai. Ab problem hai mam mujhe na mera mera kya hai ki bulk mujhe na jaise pieces me lead aa rahi hai mere paas pieces me aayengi. To piece piece ka to mere paas koi kaam hi nahi hai. Mera kaam hota hai bulk me kilo ke andar kaam hota hai mera.

Executive: Kilo ke andar hota hai mam lekin us cheez ko na line up hone pe time lagta hai aur us cheez ko line up karne ke liye aapko bhi 50% mehnat karni padegi aur woh 50% mehnat pata hai kya hai mam? Aap keh rahe ho ki mai is cheez ko bahut time se follow kar rahi hu, dekh rahi hu aur mujhe lead nahi aa rahi. Mam bura mat manna ek cheez aapko bolu aapka mai jo consumption pattern dekh rahi hu na aapka jab se service start hua hai aapne gin ke matlab aap paanch mahine laga lo paanch into agar mai 30 karti hu.

Executive: 30 din hote hai ek mahine me aapka into mai 30 karti hu.

Customer: Suniye suniye suniye suniye mam mai aapki baat ka jawab de rahi hu na. Starting me jo hua tha na tab maine lead consume ki thi, thik hai? Uske baad mujhe jab ek baat batao mujhe jab bulk me lead chahiye aur mujhe aaye do piece me, teen piece me, paanch piece me to mai kyu consume karungi mam unko? Mai kyu apna time waste karungi mai? Jab mai continue portal pe reh ke maine cheeze dekhi hai aur mujhe dhang se mai kis cheez kis lead ko consume karungi jo jo mere work se related hogi. Pehli baat to mere work se related hi nahi aayi jo lead aayi pehle, thik hai? Then uske baad me phir jab maine baar-baar follow up hua aur cheeze jab sari change hui hai badli hai uske baad me phir maine aap Smrita mam abhi dedh mahine se do mahine se mere saath hai. To unko maine dobara bataya ki ye ye cheeze mere product se related nahi aa rahi phir maine mai apne product ke name daal diye inko ki ye name hai mere product ke aur inke bihaf pe aap catalog set karo.

Executive: Mai bolu mam? Mai aapka point samajh gayi aap jo bol rahe ho. Mam aapko pata hai IndiaMART ka jo work pattern hai woh AI basis pe work karta hai, thik hai? Aap keh rahe ho aapko lead nahi aa rahi. Bulk lead nahi aa rahi. Bulk lead mam aap kisko count karte ho jo kilo me aati hai?

Customer: Aap unhe bulk me kilo me 1000 kilo, 2000 kilo, 4000 kilo.

Executive: 2000 kilo. Aapka mai point samajh gayi mam aapka hai manufacturing unit 1000, 2000 kilo manufacturing ka aap deal karte ho. Ab mam mai yaha pe na do-teen cheeze aapko batati hu aur aapko difference dikhati hu. Aap is number pe whatsapp pe hai?

Customer: Abhi to mam mai kahi pe nahi actually mai kahi kahi bahar gayi hui hu to mai aapko sham tak call karke kar sakti hu.

Executive: Kyunki abhi mere paas haan abhi mere paas mai system pe bhi nahi hu.

Executive: Aapko ek normal whatsapp pe agar ho to mai aapko kuch screenshot bhej rahi hu. Difference aapko.

Customer: Haan bhej dijiye mai check mai check kar lungi mam.

Executive: Mai usme aapko ek cheez bata deti hu mam do-teen cheeze hai aapka woh problem bhi mai sorted kar dungi and aapke sari cheeze bhi usme aapko I definitely beti hu mam ki aapko business aayega agar aap ek baar hamare tarike se service use karke dekhenge to. Dekhiye mam koi problem nahi hai dekho aap bhi kaam karne baithe ho hum bhi aapko kaam dene baithe hai sir mam kyunki ek baar ka dekho hamara aapka relation to hai nahi mam mai aaj aapko kaam dungi aap bhi cheeze samjhoge aur aap dobara paisa bhi doge, right? To mam mai bhi wohi cheeze karna chahti hu but the thing is aapka not satisfied aaya na abhi jab maybe baat hui hogi aapne not satisfied mark kiya hoga.

Customer: Haan maine maine dala tha not satisfied haan haan dala maine.

Executive: Woh thoda sa not satisfied aaya to isliye maine just aapko call karke samajhna chaha ki mam problem aa kaha rahi hai. Kyunki mai dekh rahi hu aap uses bhi bilkul nahi kar rahe ho aap aap agar mai paanch mahine ke hisab se laga lu to 150 din hote hai.

Customer: Haan use me lekin ab mai ye cheez ye cheez to mai khud hi keh rahi. Mam actually mai bahar hu abhi mai baat nahi kar sakti baat problem ye hai.

Executive: To ek kaam karte hai mam aapka na mere paas ek ticket open hua tha mai usko band kar deti hu. Please woh hamare liye mam matlab ek feedback hamare liye hota hai aapke account manager ke liye jo hum aapke liye kaam kar rahe hai. Please use satisfied mark kijiyega yes kar dijiyega ek feedback dene ke liye.

Customer: Jab tak mera kaam nahi hoga mam mai satisfied mark nahi kar sakti please so sorry.

Executive: Woh aapko kaam dene ke liye mam aapko aapko mujhse baat karna padega na. To woh baat aap jab bhi karoge.

Customer: Haan mai mai mam baat kar lungi mujhe problem nahi hai mam.

Executive: Hai na? Woh just aisa feedback hai woh negative aaya tha to maine aapko just baat kar diya. Aap mujhe koi time bata do jis time mai aapse baat kar pau baki aapki jo ticket ek band hui hai mam woh ab mai aapko matlab ek open hui hai usko mai close kar deti hu aur jo bhi hai aap mujhe ek time bata do jis time mai aapse ek baar deeply discussion kar pau aur aapse sari cheeze aapko dikha du. Koi time aapke paas?

Customer: Aap ye aap apna woh number number daal dijiyega mam whatsapp pe mai aapko call kar lungi.

Executive: Number ye hai mera mai aapko whatsapp bhi kar deti hu is number se apne number se.

Customer: Thik hai aap high send kariye. Ji ji high send kar deti hu phir bhi koi aaj ka timing mam kis time mai aapse discuss kar sakti hu 4 baje ke around?

Customer: Haan thik hai mam.

Executive: Thik hai mai 4 baje karti hu baki aapki ek ticket hai mam woh close kar deti hu phir feedback mere liye dijiyega mam. Yes dijiyega baki hum dekhte hai baat karke aage jo bhi aapka decision nikle jo bhi aap ek baar aap baith ke cheeze samajhna na purani cheeze ko side rakh ke ek new tarike se shuruwat karke dekhna, thik hai?

Customer: Thik hai ji thik hai.

Executive: Okay mam, thank you mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants payment refund due to no benefit.

- Dissatisfied with account manager support.

- Leads are not relevant to business needs.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issues and apologized.

- Executive assigned a senior account manager.

- Executive offered to send screenshots of improvements.

- Executive scheduled a follow-up call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the ticket.

- Customer will provide feedback after the call.

- Follow-up call scheduled for 4:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, account manager, subscription
